mapper.select: SELECT cinema_spec.id, cinema_spec.name, cinema_spec.description FROM cinema_spec_spec LEFT JOIN cinema_spec ON cinema_spec_spec.spec_id = cinema_spec.id WHERE cinema_spec_spec.deleted = 0 AND cinema_spec_spec.cinema_id = #{cinemaId}

SELECT cinema.id, cinema.name, cinema.description, cinema.address, cinema.home_page, cinema.tel, cinema.max_select_seat_count, cinema_spec."id" as spec_id, cinema_spec."name" as spec_name, brand.id as brand_id, brand.name as brand_name, ( SELECT COUNT(theater_hall.cinema_id) FROM theater_hall WHERE theater_hall.cinema_id = cinema.id AND theater_hall.deleted = 0 ) AS theater_count FROM cinema LEFT JOIN brand ON cinema.brand_id = brand.id LEFT JOIN cinema_spec_spec ON cinema_spec_spec.cinema_id = cinema.id LEFT JOIN cinema_spec ON cinema_spec_spec.spec_id = cinema_spec.id
cinema.deleted = 0
AND cinema.name LIKE concat('%', #{query.name}, '%')
AND cinema.id = #{query.id}

SELECT cinema.id, cinema.name, cinema.description, cinema.address, cinema.home_page, cinema.max_select_seat_count, cinema.tel, cinema_spec.id AS spec_id, cinema_spec.name AS spec_name, cinema_spec_spec.plus_price, brand.id as brand_id, brand.name as brand_name, ( SELECT COUNT(theater_hall.cinema_id) FROM theater_hall WHERE theater_hall.cinema_id = cinema.id AND theater_hall.deleted = 0 ) AS theater_count FROM cinema LEFT JOIN brand ON cinema.brand_id = brand.id LEFT JOIN cinema_spec_spec ON cinema_spec_spec.cinema_id = cinema.id LEFT JOIN cinema_spec ON cinema_spec_spec.spec_id = cinema_spec.id WHERE cinema.id = #{id}

SELECT movie_show_time.id AS id, cinema.id AS cinema_id, cinema.name AS cinema_name, cinema.address AS cinema_address, cinema.tel as cinema_tel, TO_CHAR(movie_show_time.start_time::date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS date, TO_CHAR(movie_show_time.start_time::timestamp, 'HH24:MI') AS start_time, TO_CHAR(movie_show_time.end_time::timestamp, 'HH24:MI') AS end_time, theater_hall.id as theater_hall_id, theater_hall.name as theater_hall_name FROM movie_show_time LEFT JOIN cinema ON movie_show_time.cinema_id = cinema.id LEFT JOIN theater_hall ON movie_show_time.theater_hall_id = theater_hall."id" WHERE movie_show_time.deleted = 0
GROUP BY date, movie_show_time.id, cinema.id, cinema.name, cinema.address, cinema.tel, movie_show_time.start_time, movie_show_time.end_time, theater_hall.id, theater_hall."name" ORDER BY date, movie_show_time.start_time
